Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President 
    Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to Indonesian President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono in connection with the crash of a passenger plane in the air over Sulawesi, Indonesia, that claimed heavy casualties.
 In the message Kim expressed profound sympathy and consolation to the Indonesian President and through him to the victims and their bereaved families.
